attributes.action: ensure that a full 24hr accident and emergency service is retained at Grantham Hospital.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Grantham and District Hospital is one of three acute hospitals in Lincolnshire providing a full accident and emergency service. The hospital serves a population of around 190,000 in Grantham and the surrounding area. Given the distances to the other acute hospitals and the rural nature of the county, retention of a full A&E department at Grantham together with CCU and other supporting departments is essential for the people of Lincolnshire.
